title: Property
selftext: Hi guys, my mom has recently been telling me to buy a plot, and shared the details below. Please let me know if it's legitimate. I don't know why but, I get a feeling that this is fake or a scam.
comments: It’s very cheap, imo don’t know what are the surroundings like
Buy RBI bonds or something instead of putting money on shitty investments.
It's real but in the metaverse lol
What they are going to build in 48 months?
They will develop the project and other amenities. The builder said that when they hand over the plot it will be fit for construction
